name: Zucchini Gratin
ingredients: 2 pounds zucchini (about 4 medium), sliced in 1/4-inch thick rounds
1/2 cup freshly grated parmesan cheese (2 ounces)
Additional butter for greasing the pan

instructions.en: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Butter a 10-inch pie plate or quiche pan.
instructions.sk: Predhrejte rúru na 200°C. Vymastite maslom 25 cm okrúhlu formu na koláč alebo quiche.
instructions.ja: オーブンを400°F（200°C）に予熱します。10インチ（約25cm）のパイ皿またはキッシュ皿にバターを塗ります。

instructions.en: Slice the zucchini into 1/4-inch thick rounds.
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte cuketu na 0,6 cm hrubé kolieska.
instructions.ja: ズッキーニを1/4インチ（約6mm）の厚さの輪切りにします。

instructions.en: Place the sliced zucchini in a medium pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil and cook for 2 minutes. Drain and rinse with cold water to stop the cooking.
instructions.sk: Vložte nakrájanú cuketu do stredne veľkého hrnca a zalejte vodou. Priveďte do varu a varte 2 minúty. Sceďte a opláchnite studenou vodou, aby ste zastavili varenie.
instructions.ja: スライスしたズッキーニを中サイズの鍋に入れ、水で覆います。沸騰させて2分間茹でます。ざるにあけ、冷水で洗い、調理を止めます。

instructions.en: Arrange the zucchini in the prepared pie plate in an overlapping circular pattern. Season with salt and pepper between the layers.
instructions.sk: Uložte cuketu do pripravenej formy v prekrývajúcom sa kruhovom vzore. Medzi vrstvami ochuťte soľou a korením.
instructions.ja: 準備した皿にズッキーニを重ねて円を描くように並べます。層の間に塩コショウをふります。

instructions.en: Top with the freshly grated parmesan cheese and drizzle with the melted butter.
instructions.sk: Posypte čerstvo nastrúhaným parmezánom a pokvapkajte roztopeným maslom.
instructions.ja: freshly grated パルメザンチーズをかけ、溶かしバターをかけます。

instructions.en: Increase the oven temperature to 475°F (245°C) and bake for another 10 minutes until golden brown.
instructions.sk: Zvýšte teplotu rúry na 245°C a pečte ďalších 10 minút, kým nezhnedne.
instructions.ja: オーブンの温度を475°F（245°C）に上げ、さらに10分間、きつね色になるまで焼きます。

notes: This recipe involves a two-step baking process at different temperatures to achieve the desired golden brown finish. Be careful not to overcook the zucchini in the initial boiling step.
